general_provisions: This bill addresses property tax increases through truth in taxation.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>requires certain taxing entities proposing a property tax increase to make a preliminary statement in a public meeting regarding the taxing entity's consideration of a tax increase;<hr><ltbullet>clarifies the State Tax Commission's authority to deny a taxing entity's proposed property tax increase for failing to meet truth in taxation requirements;<hr><ltbullet>requires taxing entities proposing a property tax increase to:<hr><ltbullet1>adopt and utilize a tentative operating budget that does not include revenue derived from the proposed tax increase before a tax increase is approved; and<hr><ltbullet1>present an alternative tentative budget that includes the additional revenue that would be derived from the proposed tax increase, if later approved; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes.
